entry.title: The Once and Future Professor
entry.summary:
Author: Buffoonery

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,543Chapters: 15/21Kudos: 153

Summary: Professor Emeric Ambrose is Hogwarts' new Muggle Studies teacher. His qualifications include a deep, personal animosity towards every major author of the Arthurian legends, an unnerving ability to reason with sentient furniture, and the eyes of a man who has been tired for a very, very long time.He's also Merlin.All he wants is a quiet life. But with a king in a painting who won't stop giving bad advice, a magical portrait of his nemesis down the hall, and two red-headed apprentices who are determined to learn the art of "narrative chaos," Merlin is about to discover that the only thing worse than being forgotten by history is having it come back to haunt you. Literally.

entry.title: The Price
entry.summary:
Author: dante0220

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,511Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 2

Summary: In the "Wicked Day", Merlin tries to save Uther's life. As Emrys, he tries to cast the healing spell. Unfortunately, Morgana's necklace contains an *extra* twist. As both healing spell and aging spell go wrong, Merlin is forced to flee. Kilgarrah takes him to safety. Mithian and Rodor grant him sanctuary. There Merlin realizes still more about his secondary royal destiny.

entry.title: Hidden in Plain Sight
entry.summary:
Author: The_green_fairy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,787Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 96

Summary: When fem!Merlin is injured during a bandit attack, Arthur discovers his servant's most dangerous secret—she's a woman. But that revelation pales in comparison to what comes next: Merlin has magic. Now Arthur must navigate his growing feelings while protecting the woman who has been risking everything to save his life, all while keeping her secrets from his father's deadly judgment.

entry.title: Götterdämmerung
entry.summary:
Author: ZiggyStar2000

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,173Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 16

Summary: Merlin is a literature student in Manchester in the early 2000s with an unbelievable secret. He was raised in a convent in Carmarthen and he has an ability to find lost people that cannot be explained by logic. When Arthur realizes his sister, Morgana, has gone missing, Lance introduces him to Merlin, in hopes that everything going wrong can become right once again. Merlin is reluctant at first but sometimes it's the things that scare us that are most important and destiny, of course, is not so easily avoided.Götterdämmerung - twilight of the gods

entry.summary:
Author: totheark_hm

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,029Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 32

Summary: Merlin didn't sleep well last night. Not that he ever does. entry.title: to watch the light of your eyes
entry.summary:
Author: Kermitted_to_the_Bit

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,173Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 61

Summary: “Aren’t there others who need your help?”“Perhaps,” Merlin’s response is immediate, “but seeing as the King has entered my tent, I find it prevalent to tend to him first.”Arthur’s stomach sinks like a stone. Merlin only gets respectful when he’s hiding something.They don’t hold secrets from each other anymore. Or at the very least, it's something they are working on. But old habits die hard, especially when they think it’s to protect the other.Which means Merlin is hiding something he thinks will upset Arthur. Which also means it has to do with magic.--------------------------------------- this was just an excuse to write about Physician!Merlin healing people, and then hurt comfort attacked.

entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,528Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 65

Summary: Arthur really didn’t understand what possessed his father to allow a political marriage with the druids. Still, he was a good son and a better prince, so he would obey his father’s commands. entry.title: Fate/Absolute Fake [ENG]
entry.summary:
Author: Sesaria_Herluna

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 67,697Chapters: 27/?Kudos: 9

Summary: In Harry’s sixth year, Snape delivers troubling news to the Order of the Phoenix: someone has gifted the Dark Lord with an ancient grimoire, one that speaks of an impending Holy Grail War. The prize for the victor? The universal wish-granting device known as the Holy Grail.Snape brings a copy of the text. Alarmed, the Order decides they too must enter the war. Both factions choose their candidates, waiting for the Command Spells to appear before summoning their Servants. The Holy Grail War begins.And Merlin, having foreseen the incineration of the world, once again steps onto the stage of history.Master–Servant Pairs:Saber — Arthur Pendragon | Master: Harry PotterArcher — Pikoi-a-ka-Alala | Master: Dolores UmbridgeLancer — Loki (Albus Dumbledore) | Master: Severus SnapeRider — Kilgharrah | Master: MerlinCaster — Tom Riddle / Lord Voldemort | Master: Morgan FayeAssassin — La Llorona | Master: Amos DiggoryBerserker — Harry Potter [Alter] | Master: Lord VoldemortExtra:Alter Ego — Nimueh (?) | Master: Apostle of the Foreign GodIf you're not familiar with some of the canons, it's fine. I tried to make it easy to read for everyone.

entry.title: i’ve been afraid of changing (cause i built my life around you)
entry.summary:
Author: qtchocolate

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,013Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 5

Summary: “Oh, Merlin…" Gwen moves away to look Merlin in the eye. Her hands cup his face gently— as if she were holding something fragile and delicate— and her eyes are soft and sorrowful, as she stares at him. "It's been so long…". She pauses, taking in others' faces– his small grown stubble, and the way he leans into her touch, as if he hadn’t been comforted till now– "...You've changed." He tries to smile, but the edges of face hurt. "I know."

entry.title: In Exchange For Your Heart
entry.summary:
Author: ellehir

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 307,925Chapters: 51/55Kudos: 1,148

Summary: Dark!fic AU*Now with beautiful art by LightsAtTintagel!*The Kingdom of Avalon has fallen. Arthur finds himself the reluctant keeper of the fallen enemy prince.Destiny had somehow made a mistake.***"You don't have to, you know," Arthur said. "Not all the time.""What?" came Merlin's clipped response from the corner after a moment.Arthur turned around to face his captive. "Be this," he gestured at Merlin broadly. "Be defiant, brave...stoic...all the time. It's painful to watch."Merlin did not answer. Arthur sighed."Just...just...when that door closes, when we reach the end of the day. Just allow yourself to relax for just a while." Arthur tried on a small smile, holding his palms up in a gesture of surrender. "I promise I won't tell anybody."
